cells.data:
-- mappendComparing :: [(a -> b)] -> (a -> a -> Ordering)
on mappendComparing(fs)
    script
        on |λ|(x, y)
            script
                on |λ|(ordr, f)
                    if ordr ≠ 0 then
                        ordr
                    else
                        tell mReturn(f)
                            compare(|λ|(x), |λ|(y))
                        end tell
                    end if
                end |λ|
            end script
            foldl(result, 0, fs)
        end |λ|
    end script
end mappendComparing
